message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 70, you can take 30. It's a good starting point.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair, considering the potential for inflation. Let's see if we can agree on this.
I'm willing to compromise. I'll take 60, you can take 40. It's a bit more in my favor, but I'm willing to give you a better deal than the initial 30.
